author: alec
name: Screenshot
install_msg:
**Thanks for installing.**
 This cog only allows the bot owner to take a screenshot for two main reasons:
 1. A harmful user can easily screenshot a NSFW website in a non-nsfw channel.
 2. A harmful user could attempt to screenshot an ip grabber, and get the ip of the host machine.
short: Takes a Screenshot of a given URL.
description: Takes a Screenshot of a given URL
